description: ALL MAPS NOW UPDATED TO INCLUDE THE NEW SERVICE CHANGES!!!! ----1/3 of all subway, bus and railroad rides takes place in the Big Apple.  With over 8,000 subway cars and 6300 buses the New York Transit system in one of the largest in the US.  Whether you are a visitor or a native New Yorker TMaps - NY will help you navigate the NY Tscape.  Pan and zoom the NY subway maps, lower manhattan bus & subway maps, Long Island Railroad, MetroNorth and bus maps for each borough.  NEW VERSION replaces 25 individual subway line maps and changes bus maps for greater zoom.  Prior versions added new subway and rail maps and Staten Island Ferry Schedule.   Faster Pan & Zoom.  Are you interested in finding the closest subway station to your location?  Look for TMaps - NY Closest Subway in the Palm App catalog.  This application integrates with this app to provide both maps and GPS location services.  You can add TMaps - NY Closest Subway at any time.   Maps Copyright Metropolitan Transportation Authority.  Used with permission.
